title: login broken
body: game crashed i went to log in says username or password is wrong i log in here it works but in launcher doesn't even after i changed the password

replies.body:
I went ahead and looked into your account history for you just to be safe, and it does look like someone might have been able to hack their way into your account without you realizing it. That might be why your password isn't working anymore, the hacker might have changed it out from under you!

Reach out to our account team as soon as you can by choosing the option "I need help recovering my account" in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Once you can verify yourself as the account creator, those agents will be able to repair any damage and get you back on the Rift.
